content: Is there a way to avoid t_search_data provision when running Zulip Docker connecting with Amazon RDS? I keep getting this exception when starting the container. Screen-Shot-2019-07-06-at-21.23.06.png
@Lucas Peixoto you can't use Zulip with Amazon RDS, precisely because they don't support either of the postgres full-text search extensions that Zulip supports.

@Tim Abbott Oh Ok, thank you for that. You guys may want to update your readthedocs documentation, since it says that you can run it but with a degraded experience. If this is possible by your git repository, I will happy to help you guys into that.
